bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Conducting a Transient Voltage Analysis of a Dry-Type Transformer Coil
IEEE Guide for Conducting a Transient Voltage Analysis of a Dry-Type Transformer Coil
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.58-2017 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.58-1991)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General recommendations for measuring voltage transients in dry-type distribution and power transformers are provided. Recurrent surge voltage generator circuitry, instrumentation, test sample, test point location, mounting the test coil, conducting the test, and reporting results are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
